argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumsnd.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumsnd.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 3 |  | gsumsnd.m | |- ( ph -> M e. V ) |
| 4 |  | gsumsnd.c | |- ( ph -> C e. B ) |
| 5 |  | gsumsnd.s | |- ( ( ph /\ k = M ) -> A = C ) |
| 6 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ k ph |
| 7 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ k C |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_gsumsnfd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. { M } |-> A ) ) = C ) |
